snippet: BELFER--Norman. The American Society for Yad Vashem mourns the passing of Norman Belfer, an esteemed Founder of the Society, member of the Board and Guardian of Yad Vashem, Jerusalem. His commitment to Holocaust education and remembrance served as an inspiration to us all. We extend our heartfelt sympathies to his wife Elinor and to the entire family. May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Leonard Wilf, Chairman Ron Meier, Executive Director 1/3
lead_paragraph: BELFER--Norman. The American Society for Yad Vashem mourns the passing of Norman Belfer, an esteemed Founder of the Society, member of the Board and Guardian of Yad Vashem, Jerusalem. His commitment to Holocaust education and remembrance served as an inspiration to us all. We extend our heartfelt sympathies to his wife Elinor and to the entire family. May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Leonard Wilf, Chairman Ron Meier, Executive Director 1/3
